name: Claiming New Worlds
description: Learn how to colonize neutral planets using Atmosphere Processors. Expand your empire's borders.

story.briefing: Commander, expansion is the key to victory. Neutral planets await colonization. Atmosphere Processors can terraform hostile worlds, making them habitable for your people. This process takes 10 turns to complete.
story.objective: Purchase an Atmosphere Processor, navigate it to a neutral planet, and deploy it to begin terraforming.
story.victory: Excellent work, Commander! Terraforming has begun. The Atmosphere Processor will work for 10 turns to make this world habitable. Once complete, the planet will join your empire with full production capabilities.

tutorialSteps.text: Commander, to claim a neutral planet, you need an Atmosphere Processor. First, click on your home planet to open the Planet Info panel.
Click the 'Spacecraft' button to open the Spacecraft Purchase panel. Here you can buy various types of craft.
Find the 'Atmosphere Processor' card. It shows the cost and terraforming duration (10 turns). Click 'BUY' to purchase one.
Your Atmosphere Processor is now stationed at your planet. Open the Navigation panel to send it to the neutral planet.
Select the neutral planet as your destination, then click 'NAVIGATE' to send the Atmosphere Processor.
Your Atmosphere Processor has arrived! Click on the neutral planet to view it.
With your Atmosphere Processor in orbit, you can deploy it to begin terraforming. Click 'Deploy' to start the 10-turn process.

clickByClickRecipe.title: Colonization - Step by Step

steps.instruction: Click your home planet to open the Planet Info panel
Click the 'Spacecraft' button in the Planet Info panel
steps.expectedResult: Spacecraft Purchase panel opens showing available craft

steps.instruction: Find the Atmosphere Processor card and click 'BUY'
steps.expectedResult: Atmosphere Processor is purchased and appears at planet

steps.instruction: Click 'Navigate' to open the navigation panel for the new craft
Select the neutral planet and click 'NAVIGATE'
steps.expectedResult: Atmosphere Processor moves to neutral planet

steps.instruction: Click the neutral planet where your Atmosphere Processor arrived
steps.expectedResult: Planet Info shows your craft in orbit

notes: Once complete, the planet becomes fully colonized
Only neutral planets can be terraformed
